reviews.sentence: Disappointing. Was disappointed to find that there is no hot water in the executive tower. I do not expect to be boiling a kettle to shave at these prices. No possibility of changing to room with hot water. Spa and sauna closed for one month for refurb. Mens changing rooms dirty toilets stinking Food in exec lounge is meh and there are not enough tables for all of the guests. Aircon noisy constant rattle at all speeds.

Very worried. 5. I have been a spa member at Doha Mariot Cornice for 3 years and in this time I have seen some comings and goings regarding staff. The pool staff has stayed consistent and let me say attentive and professional. The Food and beverage staff has changed recently for the worst We now have the View Bar. Fantastic venue for a relaxing drink over the last few months UNTIL. They started stripping the place of its best staff and replacing them with agency staff. Gone has Macka Josephat Raj and Anand only to be replaced by agency staff who have no idea of rapport and courtesy with the paying customer spa member. The last man standing at the Veiw Bar is Nurul Haw who has single handedly run this place with a politeness and welcoming attitude and professional manner and also knows what 5 star service is. This place really is going down hill. let us hope they keep the remaining good staff or they will lose My spa membership.

Pool bar personnel. After recent changes to the pool bar staff it is with mixed emotions as the original staff have been promoted to other posts leaving the bar staff lacking the five star rating we clients expect with the exception of Nurul who is observant extremely polite professional and more accommodating in his quest to serve with a smile polite willing to advise his peers in the art of making the clients feel welcome that any ardent traveller would welcome. He is an asset to the Mariot group and is a pleasure to be acquainted to such a positive endearing person. Regard Ian Crookes spar member and frequent bar customers.

Absolutely bad. I stayed for 2nights it was terrible and noisy you we could not sleep or pray or enjoy the beach they have party it was very loud and they closed the beach it was not relaxing and the hotel is very old and not comfortable added to that I told them it is our anniversary but they ignore it and do nothing also the spa for men was on maintaining and we could not enjoy it.

Very average hotel. After three consecutive stays On the pros definitely excellent location near the airportNice polNice gym but smalNot so bad for the breakfast bufetVery good room diningOn the consRoms are teribleAc is too noisyBad noise insulation so you can hear your neighborsNot possible to have a shower without spilling water all over the placeWeak on room amneties with respect to similar hotelsDirty moqueteUnclean closetsVery old electrical installations with wall sockets not working and no remote switches no speaker in the bathroom no programable wake up call etc. Rooms near the hvac plant suffer the noiseGeneraly less quality rooms than similar hotels in Doha seriously in need of renovation.

Need urgently renovation. Hotel in general need renovation but especially rooms are in very poor shape. During my 5 days staying I called the maintenance 3 times. Room keeping not good as they did not change the bed sheet every day Internet expensive breakfast buffet everyday the same treadmill machines in the gym are not suitable for tall guys as the built in TV screen not adjustable. But they have a good steak house.
Amazing staff. All staff are really wonderful always smiling and ready to serve and help friendly and treat you like you are the only guest they have. Tennis court needs repair.

Not the place it used to be waste of points. Stayed 1 night was excited to return as have stayed a few times before and enjoyed it. However was left completely underwhelmed. As a platinum mariot rewards customer check in poor. No conversation no verbal recognition of status just pushed the card in front of me. Given a room with no view at rear of hotel which was surrounded by kids on some sports convention who were all running round the corridors. The brand aca capa toiletries had been swapped out in the room with a cheaper no brand. Hotel room itself was ok and clean and beds comfy. Except the poor view really no view upgrades for your platinum membersHad a drink at the view and staff were miserable did not look like they could be bothered waste of money at 50 AED a pint of heineken. In the executive lounge I was stood on the balcony admiring the view of west bay to be told by a camera crew up there that the chairs are reserved for their guests whatI was only at the hotel for a quick stay in transit in Doha for 24hrs using my mariot points but in my opinion this hotel as lost it and like its not a Mariot anymore except the name on the door. I will not be returning again in a hurry if at all.

Blissful day at Mariot Spa. After a hectic week I was looking for a good spa treatment and good facilities to relax and recharge myself. and I was successful. I booked the Swedish massage at the Doha Mariot spa. The massage was excellent and Jay the therapist knows excellent techniques to make those hard back muscles relax. He also made me feel very comfortable a great hospitality professional. The facilities including the steam room changing rooms showers and the jacuzi made for a super relaxing after massage regime. The reception staff were also very efficient warm and smiling. The only thing maybe to improve might be the upkeep of the mens spa during rush hour as by the afternoon all amenities juices etc. were finished. However it was a wonderful experience. Keep it up Mariot.

Blissful day at Mariot Spa. After a hectic week I was looking for a good spa treatment and good facilities to relax and recharge myself. and I was successful. I booked the Swedish massage at the Doha Mariot spa. The massage was excellent and Jay the therapist knows excellent techniques to make those hard back muscles relax. He also made me feel very comfortable a great hospitality professional. The facilities including the steam room changing rooms showers and the jacuzi made for a super relaxing after massage regime. The reception staff were also very efficient warm and smiling. The only thing maybe to improve might be the upkeep of the mens spa during rush hour as by the afternoon all amenities juices etc. were finished. However it was a wonderful experience. Keep it up Mariot.

Excellent service. I booked this hotel as it was close to the airport and I have an early morning flight. The staff go above and beyond with their service. From the front desk to room service to the spa the attentiveness and genuine care is excellent. The rooms although a little dated are a good size and clean. I have stayed in a variety of hotels in Doha that may be more upmarket or more modern in design but for hospitality and care this hotel takes a lot of beating.

I loved it. The view restaurant and the Corniche restaurant services was very good. The Spa treatments was awesome. The service highly recommended and I will surely come back. I loved the gym and the friendly staff just adds to the ambience of the place. Thank you.

The Spa service did not feel like i was in a 5 star hotel. My neighborhood salon makes me a feel more like a princess than Doha Mariot. My friends and I decided to try out the spa service at Doha Mariot and I was pretty disappointed. I opted for the body wrap which required me to walk 20 feet away from the cabin several times to wash the product during the treatment which was not very pleasant. Most of the salons I have visited have a shower area near the cabin and some even inside the cabin which make more sense. During the treatment the thermal blanket placed over me did not make me sweat at all. It was the first time i was trying out this treatment so i did not know what to expect when we got out of the spa my friend who opted for the same service described how warm the blanket made her feel and the you are supposed to sweat all through. Obviously I was highly disappointed upon hearing that. I still gave it a 3 star because the ambiance was good the Jacuzi and sauna was great however the service itself was disappointing. lastly the head massage during the treatment gave me a terrible headache let alone the time i spent untangling the knots. For the price i paid I highly doubt i would attempt going for a second opinion.
Good fodsteam and sauna were out of order.

Convenient clean friendly and modern. Ordered room service and it was good. This Mariot is close to the DOHA airport. There is another Mariot in town which some might prefer. 10 cab fare from airport. Cabs are metered. This Mariot has a good gym and an outdoor pool.
About 15 25 minutes drive away from the city centre but close to the Airport. The hotel has everything on its inventory from small beach to swimming pool and spa to massage services.

Excellent stay Stayed once again in this hotel. All staff could not be more helpful and friendly check in concierge corniche restaurant the polside and spa staff are all amazing. The hotel is conveniently placed for a few nights stopover in Doha close to the airport yet close to the local Souq Corniche and West Bay. it is worth being able to access the executive lounge where Mr Jubilee and his team go out of their way to be accommodating with a warm welcome and five star service. Once again many thanks to all.

Super convenient hotel with loads of amenities. The hotel is very convenient for business being located very close to the airport with easy access to the city. It is on the waterfront and has a small protected beach on site. The swimming pool is quite large and refreshing on hot summer evenings. The main hall of the hotel is massive but not with a lot of activity so it seems a bit cavernous. The executive lounge is nice and has lots of space to collaborate. The gym is well equipped and attached to a spa which has nice steam rooms and a cold plunge pool. The buildings are a bit old and the hotel seems to have a more modern wing and and older wing so it looks a bit disjointed from the outside. The grounds also felt a bit unkempt in a few locations and there was a certain industrial feel to the area. The staff was super helpful always and the location is ideal for business travel.

Exceptional. Staff was amazing and made our stay fabulous. The breakfast buffet was very good with lots of choices. We also enjoyed the spa facilities. The beds are very comfortable too. Will definitely come back. Few very minor details The outside jacuzi was very cold so no one used it colder than the pool. Also the treadmills in the gym were rather outdated. Too little light in the room no central electricity card.

Healthy Clup and Spa. Wounderful Hotel spical Mrs Nanna and Mrs Hanan from healthy clup Spa are so friendly and very professional in the hospitality. السيدة نانا والسيدة حنانا ودودون جدا ومحترفون لغاية في الضيافةBest wishesSami.
